value.title: AZ-104: Prerequisites for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: If you're an IT Administrator that's new to Azure and need to prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator, this path is the place to start. Learn the basic Azure concepts you'll need to know as an Azure administrator.

topItems.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy
topItems.excerpt: Learn about governance and management in Azure services.

images.title: Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn about the decisions you make before creating a virtual machine, the options to create and manage the VM, and the extensions and services you use to manage your VM.

images.title: Introduction to Azure virtual machines

topItems.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
topItems.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

images.title: Fundamentals of computer networking

topItems.title: Fundamentals of network security
topItems.excerpt: Explore the fundamentals of computer networking security and monitoring.

images.title: Fundamentals of network security
Apply and monitor infrastructure standards with Azure Policy

value.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure networking options
value.excerpt: Running your app or service in the cloud requires a fast and secure network. Learn some of the Azure networking basics and how Azure networking helps improve resiliency and reduce latency.

images.title: Core Cloud Services - Azure networking options

value.title: Architect network infrastructure in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn how to architect a secure, flexible, network infrastructure in Azure and connect on-premises networks to your Azure resources.

topItems.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway
topItems.excerpt: VPN Gateway in Azure provides secure connectivity between your on-premises networks and clients.

images.title: Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway

topItems.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
topItems.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

images.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute

topItems.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
topItems.excerpt: Network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

images.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints

topItems.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

images.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
Connect your on-premises network to Azure with VPN Gateway

value.title: Implement network security in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure, protect, and isolate your networks in Azure.

topItems.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure
topItems.excerpt: Discuss the basic concepts for protecting your infrastructure and data when you work in the cloud. Understand what responsibilities are yours and what Azure takes care of for you.

images.title: Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure

topItems.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to configure networking in a secure way for your Azure virtual machines.

images.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines

topItems.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints
topItems.excerpt: Network security groups and service endpoints help you secure your virtual machines and Azure services from unauthorized network access.

images.title: Secure and isolate access to Azure resources by using network security groups and service endpoints

topItems.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
topItems.excerpt: Secure the traffic from your users all the way to your web servers by enabling TLS encryption on Application Gateway.

images.title: Encrypt network traffic end to end with Azure Application Gateway
Security, responsibility, and trust in Azure

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
value.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

images.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute

value.title: AZ-104: Configure and manage virtual networks for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to configure and manage Azure network capabilities like connectivity services, application protection, application delivery, and network monitoring services. This learning path helps prepare you for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to configure networking in a secure way for your Azure virtual machines.

images.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines

topItems.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment
topItems.excerpt: A good Azure IP addressing schema provides flexibility, room for growth, and integration with on-premises networks. The schema ensures that communication works for deployed resources, minimizes public exposure of systems, and gives the organization flexibility in its network. If not properly designed, systems might not be able to communicate, and additional work will be required to remediate.

images.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment

topItems.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
topItems.excerpt: Create a DNS zone for your domain name. Create DNS records to map the URL to an IP address. Test that the domain name resolves to your web server.

images.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS

topItems.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

images.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
Configure the network for your virtual machines

value.title: Build great solutions with the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
value.excerpt: Learn how to design and build secure, scalable, high-performing solutions in Azure using the pillars of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework.

topItems.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework
topItems.excerpt: You want to build great things on Azure, but you’re not sure exactly what that means. Using key principles throughout your architecture regardless of technology choice, can help you design, build, and continuously improve your architecture.

images.title: Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to design an Azure architecture that uses modern practices and gives you full visibility into what's happening in your environment.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Operational excellence

topItems.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
topItems.excerpt: Scaling your system to handle load, identifying network bottlenecks, and optimizing your storage performance are important to ensure your users have the best experience. Learn how to make your application perform at its best.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Performance efficiency
Introduction to the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework

value.excerpt: Learn how to configure and manage Azure network capabilities like connectivity services, application protection, application delivery, and network monitoring services.

If not properly designed, systems might not be able to communicate, and additional work will be required to remediate.

topItems.excerpt: Create a DNS zone for your domain name. Create DNS records to map the URL to an IP address. Test that the domain name resolves to your web server.

topItems.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

images.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering

value.title: AZ-400: Develop a Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) strategy
value.excerpt:
Learn how Site Reliability Engineering enables you to sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.
Take this learning path to help prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
topItems.excerpt: Organizations big and small have started to realize just how crucial system and application reliability is to their business. They’ve also learned just how difficult it is to maintain that reliability while iterating at the speed demanded by the marketplace. Site Reliability Engineering (SRE) is a proven approach to this challenge.

images.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

images.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure

topItems.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging
topItems.excerpt: Use application logs in Azure Web Apps to help debug web app code.

images.title: Capture Web Application Logs with App Service Diagnostics Logging

topItems.title: Manage site reliability
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to manage site reliability.

images.title: Manage site reliability
Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)

value.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager
value.excerpt: Azure Traffic Manager provides DNS load balancing to your application, so you improve your ability to distribute your application around the world. Use Traffic Manager to improve the performance and availability of your application.

images.title: Enhance your service availability and data locality by using Azure Traffic Manager

value.title: Architect secure infrastructure in Azure learning path
value.excerpt: Learn about the tools and services available on Azure to ensure your resources are secure.

topItems.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center
topItems.excerpt: In this module, you’ll use the alert capabilities of Azure Security Center to watch for and respond to threats.

images.title: Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center

topItems.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Disk Encryption (ADE) to encrypt OS and data disks on existing and new VMs.

images.title: Secure your Azure virtual machine disks

topItems.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault
topItems.excerpt: Your application requires service passwords, connection strings, and other secret configuration values to do its job. Storing and handling secret values is risky, and every usage introduces the possibility of leakage. Azure Key Vault, in combination with managed identities for Azure resources, enables your Azure web app to access secret configuration values easily and securely without needing to store any secrets in your source control or configuration.

images.title: Manage secrets in your server apps with Azure Key Vault

topItems.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to use RBAC to manage access to resources in Azure.

images.title: Secure your Azure resources with role-based access control (RBAC)
Resolve security threats with Azure Security Center

value.title: Improve application scalability and resiliency by using Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Discuss the different load balancers in Azure and how to choose the right Azure load balancer solution to meet your requirements.

images.title: Improve application scalability and resiliency by using Azure Load Balancer

value.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes
value.excerpt: Learn how to control Azure virtual network traffic by implementing custom routes.

images.title: Manage and control traffic flow in your Azure deployment with routes

value.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway
value.excerpt: Improve application resilience by distributing load across multiple servers and use path-based routing to direct web traffic.

images.title: Load balance your web service traffic with Application Gateway

value.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools
value.excerpt: Use Network Watcher tools, diagnostics, and logs to help find and fix networking issues in your Azure infrastructure.

images.title: Monitor and troubleshoot your end-to-end Azure network infrastructure by using network monitoring tools

value.excerpt: Learn how to configure networking in a secure way for your Azure virtual machines.

value.excerpt: A good Azure IP addressing schema provides flexibility, room for growth, and integration with on-premises networks. The schema ensures that communication works for deployed resources, minimizes public exposure of systems, and gives the organization flexibility in its network. If not properly designed, systems might not be able to communicate, and additional work will be required to remediate.

images.title: Design an IP addressing schema for your Azure deployment

value.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure
value.excerpt: You have a traditional on-premises infrastructure that you need to connect to resources in Azure. In this module, you learn how to select a connectivity method for your use cases that balances functionality, cost, and security.

images.title: Design a hybrid network architecture on Azure

value.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture
value.excerpt: Design a network architecture in Azure that allows for growth and flexibility, secure isolation of critical resources, low administrative overhead, and communication with on-premises network resources.

images.title: Centralize your core services by using hub and spoke Azure virtual network architecture

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Review multidimensional metrics for the load balancer in Azure Monitor Metrics, and check health probe status for the load balancer.

images.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
value.excerpt: Learn how to handle infrastructure and service failure, recover from the loss of data, and recover from a disaster by incorporating reliability into your architecture.

images.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Reliability
